summary: IN DEC 2013, WAS DRIVING TO PARK AND RIDE. MULTIPLE LIGHTS WERE DISPLAYING ESP AND TRACTION. WHATEVER WAS GOING ON IT EFFECTED FORWARD MOTION AND SEEMED AS IF THE VEHICLE WAS CONTROLLING ITSELF TO GO FORWARD WHILE MAKING GRINDING SOUNDS. IT CLEARED UP AS I CONTINUED TO DRIVE. I CONTACTED DEALER AND PARKED UNTIL I, CAREFULLY/SLOWING DROVE IT INTO SERVICE DEPARTMENT.  THEY CALLED ME AT WORK AND TOLD ME IT WAS CLKSPRING--STEERING ANGLE/CLOCKSPRING, PART # 56046497AD AND THE COSTS ABOUT $800.00!  I STATED WAS IT A POWERTRAIN ISSUE AND WAS TOLD NO.  NOW, FEBRUARY 2015, THE SAME ISSUE SEEMS TO BE OCCURRING.  THE TRACTION LIGHT IS FLASHING, ESP LIGHT IS LITE.  IF I STEP OUT OF THE VEHICLE AND CLOSE THE DOORS, THEY LOCK ON THEIR OWN (THAT MAY BE A SEPARATE ISSUE, NOT SURE).  *TR
